about_the_game: Why settle for trick OR treat when you can have the best of both worlds? Meet the Halloweenies... the newest gruesome group of six new cards for Squirmish: The Videogame of Brawling Beasties! Meet Spooksie, Slenderfella, the Unsmellable Man... and three more foul fiends! They are full of crazy tricks with their all-new special abilities... and their group ability is full of treats! Once the Halloweenies are activated, you get to roll a die on your turn for each Halloweenie you control. If you roll under the number of Halloweenies in play, you get to draw a card! It's like getting your plastic pumpkin filled to the brim with candy every time you play, except it won't make you vomit!
